plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: PagePorter
plugins.description: PagePort is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you easily export and import page names in multiple formats like CSV, JSON, XML, and more. Whether you’re documenting layouts, syncing with development tools, or organizing files, PagePort streamlines your workflow with just a few clicks. It supports drag-and-drop file import, real-time feedback.

plugins.name: 혼용되는 외래어, 한자어 & 금용용어 사전
plugins.description:
혼용되는 외래어와 한자어, 어려운 금융 용어까지 한눈에!

이 서비스는 일상에서 자주 접하지만 정확히 알기 어려운 단어들을 쉽게 풀어주는 언어 가이드입니다.

단어의 출처, 의미, 바른 사용법은 물론, 대체 가능한 순우리말까지 함께 제공하여

더 정확하고 이해하기 쉬운 소통을 도와드립니다.


📘 외래어 vs 한자어 구분

💬 금융 용어 번역과 설명

🔍 혼동되는 표현 비교


언제나 쉽고, 누구나 알 수 있도록.

“이 단어, 정말 맞는 표현일까?” 고민될 땐, 지금 바로 검색하세요.


A guide to mixed foreign, Sino-Korean, and finance terms — all in one place.

This service helps you understand commonly used yet often confusing words with ease.

We offer origins, meanings, proper usage, and even alternative native Korean terms,

making communication clearer and more accurate.


📘 Distinguish foreign vs Sino-Korean terms

💬 Translate and simplify financial jargon

🔍 Compare confusing expressions side-by-side


Simple. Understandable. For everyone.

“Is this the right word to use?”

Just search and find out.

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: 낯선 단어, 친절한 해석 (Confusing Words, Clear Meanings)

plugins.name: ui-palette-generator
plugins.description:
Supply a primary color and the plugin will generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes. Each palette includes:


Palette

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary (primary analogous, complementary, split compliment left, or split compliment right)
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Background

  1. z0
  2. z1
  3. z2
  4. z3
  5. z4
  6. z5


Palette hover

  1. Primary
  2. Secondary
  3. Success
  4. Warn
  5. Error
  6. Info


Text

  1. base (either #000 or #fff)
  2. light (base @ 75% opacity)
  3. lighter (base @ 50% opacity)
  4. lightest (base @ 33% opacity)


Text on palette

  1. textBaseOnPrimary
  2. textLightOnPrimary
  3. textLighterOnPrimary
  4. textLightestOnPrimary
  5. etc


Clicking "Add to document" will add both the light and dark themes as variable modes. If you're using the free plan, only the selected theme is added.


The plugin UI provides a live preview of the generated palettes in use.
plugins.tagline: Generate accessible light and dark themed ui color palettes

plugins.name: Lazer
plugins.description:
Lazer is a plugin for Figma that provides quick commands to adjust the layout and appearance properties of selected elements. It is somewhat opinionated.


The idea is to leave the keyboard less by creating pseudo shortcuts. By bringing up the Actions input with command + K or command + / and then typing a short code (eg. w.h), the fuzzy search will bring your focus to an action you can execute by pressing enter.


I used Gemini 2.5 Pro to build this.


Features

This plugin allows you to quickly adjust:


Width & Height

w.h - Set Width to Hug

h.h - Set Height to Hug

w.f - Set Width to Fill

h.f - Set Height to Fill

w.. - Set Width (prompts for custom value)

h.. - Set Height (prompts for custom value)


Padding

p.0 - Set All Padding to 0

p.16 - Set All Padding to 16

p.. - Set Padding (prompts for custom value)


Auto Layout

al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment (opens alignment UI)

al.h - Set Auto Layout to Horizontal

al.v - Set Auto Layout to Vertical

g.0 - Set Gap to 0

g.8 - Set Gap to 8

g.16 - Set Gap to 16

g.. - Set Gap (prompts for custom value)


Border Radius

br.0 - Set Border Radius to 0px

br.8 - Set Border Radius to 8px

br.. - Set Border Radius (prompts for custom value)


Stroke

s.0 - Set Stroke Width to 0

s.1 - Set Stroke Width to 1

sw.. - Set Stroke Width (prompts for custom value)

sc.. - Set Stroke Colour (prompts for custom value)


Fill

f.1 - Add White Fill

f.0 - Remove All Fills

f.. - Set Fill Colour (prompts for custom value)


Text

ls.. - Set Text Letter Spacing (prompts for custom value)

t.s - Set Text Size (prompts for custom value)


General

help! - Show Commands and Shortcuts (displays this list in a popup)


Usage

  1. Open the Actions input with command + K or command + /
  2. Type the short code for the command (eg. w.h)
  3. Press enter (assuming you have your desired command in focus)


* Many commands apply adjustments directly (e.g., w.h - Set Width to Hug).

* The al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment command will open a dialog for visual alignment selection.

* Commands ending with .. (e.g., p.. - Set Padding) will prompt you to enter a custom value.
plugins.tagline: Shortcuts as quick actions to help you Figma faster

plugins.name: JSON to Variable
plugins.description:
You can import a JSON file to create grouped Figma variables. you can download the pre-structured Tailwind color palette JSON file via the link as a starting point:


Tailwind colors structured.json


The following is an example of a correctly formatted JSON:

[
{
"CollectionName": {
"modes": {
"ModeName": {
"GroupName": {
"Primary": {
"$value": "#FFFFFF",
"$type": "color"
},

"secondary": {
"$value": "#F5F5F5",
"$type": "color"
}
},
"GroupName2": {
"primary": {
"$value": "#2196F3",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}
}
}
]
plugins.tagline: Import JSON file to variable

plugins.name: Content Generator
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you replace selected text layers with smart, AI-generated content based on your own descriptions. No more lorem ipsum—just real, context-aware mock text that fits your design.


How to use

Select one or more text layers, then enter the kind of content you'd like to generate—like “names,” “job titles,” or “short bios”—and the plugin will fill them in instantly.
plugins.tagline: Generate realistic text content in Figma instantly—based on your own prompts.

135435.description:

How to use

Select one or more text layers, then enter the kind of content you'd like to generate—like “names,” “job titles,” or “short bios”—and the plugin will fill them in instantly.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access a local backend server during development and a deployed backend server for generating content using OpenAI.

plugins.name: Bangalicon
plugins.description:
🔥 Bangalicon - The First Icon Plugin You Will Ever Need For Figma


Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. Bangalicons' curated collection of beautifully crafted icons spanning interfaces, communication, business, media, and more is at your fingertips now. It has been meticulously designed for speed, flexibility, and pixel perfection.


✨ Key Features:


500+ icons: Scalable and diverse as per the requirement.


Live Preview & Insert: You can browse, search, and without leaving Figma, icons can be inserted seamlessly which saves time.


Category-based filtering: Finding what you want is made easier because of organized categories.


Will Bangalicon work on IOS apps? Yes. Whether it is website designing or mobile marketing visuals, Bangalicon for Figma is guaranteed to raise your level of design visually in an instant.


⚡️ Save time and design better with Bangalicon.
plugins.tagline: The world of most creative icons

139238.release_notes:
- Added style switcher popup (Regular ↔ Solid) for selected frames
- Improved icon preview UI with better search and filtering
- Optimized drag-and-drop for smoother icon placement
- Fixed icon insertion bug in some nested frames
- Minor performance and loading speed improvements
139238.tagline: The world of most creative icons

plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: Nativ Localization
plugins.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
plugins.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

140769.name: Nativ Localization
140769.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
140769.release_notes: Improve design and performance, connect Nativ API
140769.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

plugins.name: Random Rectangle Maker
plugins.description:
This plugin was made for testing purposes to test the cursor AI. I used Cursor AI to write the code and ChatGPT to help design the cover and icon. It’s a quick example of how fun and fast building with AI tools can be.


With one click, the plugin adds a rectangle to your canvas. Each rectangle shows up in a random spot with a random bright color.


→ Made with the help of Cursor AI for coding

→ Visuals created with ChatGPT

→ Quick, simple, and fun to use

→ A small tool for creative ideas


I really enjoy working where design and code come together. If you’re building something creative like a design tool, plugin, or even a storytelling project, I’d love to connect.

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

133684.description:

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.

plugins.name: Flatten Vectors Within
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that flattens all vector shapes (such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and paths) within each selected frame or group into a single vector layer. Each frame or group is processed individually, so layers aren’t merged throughout. It’s a quick way to clean up icons or illustrations and make overrides easier when turning them into components.


Created with the help of AI.


How to use the plugin

  1. Select one or more frames or groups that contain vector layers.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Each frame or group will now contain a single vector layer named Vector.

accepted.name: Ali Salem
accepted.description: A product designer driven by a sense of responsibility towards enabling and empowering others. Currently building Design Systems at Auth0.

plugins.tagline: Flattens vectors in each selected frame or group into one layer — processed separately.

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: Contrast ◈ | WCAG + APCA
plugins.description:
Get both WCAG and APCA contrast validation in one seamless tool. Contrast ◈ brings familiar Figma styling and workflows to accessibility testing, making it easy to check compliance during design rather than after handoff.


Key features:

  1. Dual standard support: Traditional WCAG guidelines plus modern APCA perceptual contrast
  2. Native Figma UI design patterns
  3. Quick selection options that fit naturally into your existing design process
  4. Perfect for teams transitioning between contrast standards
  5. Immediate feedback to catch accessibility issues early


Whether you're meeting current WCAG requirements or preparing for future perceptual contrast standards, Contrast ◈ keeps your workflow smooth while ensuring your designs are accessible to all users.
plugins.tagline: Familiar Figma based UI for quick color contrast check beyond WCAG basics

plugins.name: FlowBoards
plugins.description:
Overview

FlowBoards creates organized iteration, benchmark and moodboard layouts from your selected design elements.


Choose from three board types:

- Iteration boards

- Benchmark boards

- Moodboards


Select your designs, pick a layout, customize with titles, subtitles, links and notes, then generate your board instantly.


Useful for design documentation, client presentations, design reviews and team collaboration.


Roadmap

V2 will introduce custom board templates - create and save your own board styles for consistent reuse across projects. The plugin will continue evolving based on community feedback and feature requests.

plugins.name: Icon Set Generator
plugins.description:
Turn a single icon into organized variable sizes, colors, and styles in a few clicks!


Streamline your arduous icon workflow in Figma. All you need to start is an icon in a frame, or in a component.


Icon Set Generator then helps you quickly create organized icon systems by duplicating and resizing frames, components, or variant sets into multiple sizes with custom stroke weights and an optional dark mode.


✅ Auto-generates variant size sets with consistent naming

✅ Lets you add dark mode (white) icon variants in a click

✅ Supports “group by existing properties” for when selecting an icon component with different variant styles already applied (filled, outline, etc).

✅ Perfect for creating multi-size icon libraries for web, iOS, and Android design systems


I'm a designer who was always faced with this pain point when creating icon sets to use in my design systems, this plugin has saved me hours, and I hope it can do the same for you!


Compatible with Material Design icons, Feather, Heroicons, and any custom SVG icons you drop into Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly generate multi-size icon sets & organized variants for Figma design systems.

140764.name: Icon Set Generator
140764.description:

Icon Set Generator then helps you quickly create organized icon systems by duplicating and resizing frames, components, or variant sets into multiple sizes with custom stroke weights and an optional dark mode.

plugins.name: Designer Performance Score
plugins.description:
🎯 Designer Performance Score

An advanced tool to help design teams and leads evaluate UI/UX designer efficiency across three key metrics:


  1. Acceptance Rate: How many screens got approved vs. how many were designed.
  2. Revised Rate: How many times a screen got revised before acceptance.
  3. UI Screens per Scenario: How many screens are created for each user scenario.


🔧 Comes with adjustable thresholds for each metric, dynamic feedback, and color-coded results to quickly detect efficiency bottlenecks.


Perfect for performance reviews, retrospectives, or mentoring sessions.


📚 Inspired by https://sedatcakir.net/blog/tasarimcinin-performansi-nasil-olculur
plugins.tagline: Score your design work using real metrics like acceptance rate and revision frequency. 🎯

plugins.name: Fybril
plugins.description:
Fybril is a design-to-analytics tool made for product teams. It helps you define what to measure in your design and product decisions—and see how those decisions perform through connected analytics. Fybril stands out by combining design understanding with analytics planning in one easy workflow.


Whether you're a product designer or a product manager, Fybril helps you track what matters, streamline communication with developers, and stay aligned with your goals.


With Fybril you can:

  1. Figma Plugin — Import your designs directly from Figma to start connecting design with events to track.
  2. Home View — Define the problem you're solving, outline product or business goals, and describe the solution you want to track and analyze.
  3. Flow View — Build a user flow using screens and text blocks. Set the first screen as the entry point to start preparing the event tracking plan.
  4. Events View—Manage all events and event properties linked to your screens. This creates a clear, visual tracking plan to guide developers on what to implement.
  5. Analytics View—See insights for your flow or sub-flows. (Currently support only Mixpanel)
  6. Share & Collaborate—Invite teammates to your workspace and share your tracking plan or complete documents (Home, Flow, Events, Analytics) for seamless collaboration.


Getting started video | Website﻿
plugins.tagline: Align teams with a shared tracking plan to drive smarter decisions

139819.name: Fybril
139819.description:
Fybril is a design-to-analytics tool made for product teams. It helps you define what to measure in your design and product decisions—and see how those decisions perform through connected analytics. Fybril stands out by combining design understanding with analytics planning in one easy workflow.


Whether you're a product designer or a product manager, Fybril helps you track what matters, streamline communication with developers, and stay aligned with your goals.


With Fybril you can:

  1. Figma Plugin — Import your designs directly from Figma to start connecting design with events to track.
  2. Home View — Define the problem you're solving, outline product or business goals, and describe the solution you want to track and analyze.
  3. Flow View — Build a user flow using screens and text blocks. Set the first screen as the entry point to start preparing the event tracking plan.
  4. Events View—Manage all events and event properties linked to your screens. This creates a clear, visual tracking plan to guide developers on what to implement.
  5. Analytics View—See insights for your flow or sub-flows. (Currently support only Mixpanel)
  6. Share & Collaborate—Invite teammates to your workspace and share your tracking plan or complete documents (Home, Flow, Events, Analytics) for seamless collaboration.


Getting started video | Website﻿
139819.tagline: Align teams with a shared tracking plan to drive smarter decisions

plugins.name: Screen Count
plugins.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
plugins.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

139292.description:

plugins.name: HTML Table → AutoLayout
plugins.description:
Hello everyone! 👋


I created this plugin for myself to convert Excel sheets into ready-to-use Auto Layouts.

If you export your Excel file to HTML, this tool lets you import the tables into Figma instantly and start working with them right away.


✨ Hope it comes in handy for someone else, too! ✨
plugins.tagline: Create auto layout line-wise tables from HTML
